theme.name: Modern Craftsman
theme.aesthetic: Clean, professional, and trustworthy with warm undertones
theme.targetAudience: Homeowners aged 30-65 looking for quality home improvement services
theme.designPrinciples: Showcase quality craftsmanship, build trust through testimonials, emphasize transformation
theme.gradientStyle: Subtle earth-tone gradients from warm beige to deep charcoal

pages.name: Home
pages.layout: Hero section with before/after slider, services overview, testimonials carousel, and call-to-action

pages.name: Services
pages.layout: Service categories grid with icons, detailed descriptions, and pricing guides

pages.name: Portfolio
pages.layout: Project gallery with before/after comparisons, filterable by room type

pages.name: About
pages.layout: Company story, team profiles, certifications, and process overview

pages.name: Contact
pages.layout: Contact form, service area map, office location, and free estimate request
